      • restartYamcsInstance

        public static YamcsServerInstance restartYamcsInstance(String instanceName)
        Restarts a yamcs instance. As we cannot restart instances, we create a new one and replace the old one.
        Parameters:
        instanceName - the name of the instance
        Returns:
        the newly created instance

      • createYamcsInstance

        public static YamcsServerInstance createYamcsInstance(String name)
                                               throws IOException
        Creates a new yamcs instance. If the instance already exist and not in the state FAILED or OFFLINE a ConfigurationException is thrown
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new instance
        Returns:
        the newly created instance
        Throws:
        IOException
